title: Helvetica World
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131002214817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131002214817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Helvetica World**

The name of the [Helvetica Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131002214817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Helvetica%20Linotype) font family before 2006. See [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131002214817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Helvetica) or [http://www.linotype.com/48344/helveticaworld-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131002214817/http:/www.linotype.com/48344/helveticaworld-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/48344/helveticaworld-family.html") for more information.
author: dan_reynolds
